name: presbyterian
content:

Add to word list
relating or belonging to a Christian group that has members especially in Scotland and the US

someone who follows the ideas and teachings of the Presbyterian Christian group: He grew up as a Presbyterian in a small farming town in Tennessee. He is a free Presbyterian who will not work on Sundays or give interviews to Sunday newspapers.
More examplesFewer examplesThere were only conservative Baptists, Presbyterians, and Methodists in the area at the time. The college was founded in 1869 by Presbyterians.His people were strict Presbyterians.

a member of a Christian religious group that is one of the Protestant churches
of or relating to the Presbyterian religious group or its members: a Presbyterian church a Presbyterian minister
